TitleEnglish: Ganbare! Lulu Lolo - Tiny Twin Bears
SummaryEnglish: Twin bear sisters Lulu and Lolo are hard workers but are also quick to cry. Lulu is an orange bear. Lolo is yellow. They love their grandma's homemade cookies. They take on new challenges every day. Although the tasks they undertake may be easy for adults to accomplish, it's a huge mission for the young sisters.
